cards.name: Sunreaver Warmage
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
cards.flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

cards.name: Aranasi Broodmother
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

cards.name: Darkest Hour
cards.text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

cards.name: Eccentric Scribe
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon\nfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
cards.flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

cards.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
cards.flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

cards.name: Mad Summoner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
cards.flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

cards.name: Oblivitron
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

cards.name: Portal Overfiend
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
cards.flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

cards.name: Unidentified Contract
cards.text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
cards.flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

cards.name: Unleash the Beast
cards.text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
cards.flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

cards.name: Unseen Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

cards.name: Violet Warden
cards.text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
cards.flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

cards.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
cards.flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

cards.name: Blastmaster Boom
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

cards.name: Chef Nomi
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
cards.flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

cards.name: Exotic Mountseller
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n3-Cost Beast.
cards.flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

cards.name: Swampqueen Hagatha
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
cards.flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

cards.name: Tak Nozwhisker
cards.text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
cards.flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

cards.name: Tunnel Blaster
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions.
cards.flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

cards.name: Underbelly Ooze
cards.text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
cards.flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

cards.name: Vereesa Windrunner
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
cards.flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

cards.name: Batterhead
cards.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
cards.flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

cards.name: Catrina Muerte
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a friendly minion\nthat died this game.
cards.flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

cards.name: Fel Lord Betrug
cards.text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
cards.flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

cards.name: Heroic Innkeeper
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
cards.flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

cards.name: Jepetto Joybuzz
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
cards.flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

cards.name: Lucentbark
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
cards.flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

cards.name: Power of Creation
cards.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
cards.flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

cards.name: The Forest's Aid
cards.text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.
cards.flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

cards.name: Walking Fountain
cards.text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
cards.flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

cards.name: Whirlwind Tempest
cards.text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
cards.flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

cards.name: Archivist Elysiana
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2_copies of each.
cards.flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

cards.name: Burly Shovelfist
cards.text: Rush
cards.flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

cards.name: Mass Resurrection
cards.text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
cards.flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

cards.name: Big Bad Archmage
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

cards.name: Dimensional Ripper
cards.text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

cards.name: Jumbo Imp
cards.text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
cards.flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

cards.name: Kalecgos
cards.text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

cards.name: Nozari
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
cards.flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

cards.name: The Boom Reaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
cards.flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

cards.name: Totemic Surge
cards.text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
cards.flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

cards.name: Activate the Obelisk
cards.text: Quest: Restore 15_Health.\nReward: Obelisk's Eye.
cards.flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

cards.name: Bazaar Burglary
cards.text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from\nother classes to your hand.\nReward: Ancient Blades.
cards.flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

cards.name: Beaming Sidekick
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
cards.flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

cards.name: Brazen Zealot
cards.text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

cards.name: Corrupt the Waters
cards.text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry\ncards.\nReward: Heart of Vir'naal.
cards.flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

cards.name: Embalming Ritual
cards.text: Give a minion Reborn.
cards.flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

cards.name: Hack the System
cards.text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times\nwith your hero.\nReward: Anraphet's Core.
cards.flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

cards.name: Into the Fray
cards.text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

cards.name: Jar Dealer
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random\n1-Cost minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

cards.name: Making Mummies
cards.text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn\nminions.\nReward: Emperor Wraps.
cards.flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

cards.name: Mogu Cultist
cards.text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
cards.flavor: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

cards.name: Murmy
cards.text: Reborn
cards.flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

cards.name: Pharaoh Cat
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your_hand.
cards.flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

cards.name: Plague of Flames
cards.text: [x]Destroy all your minions.\nFor each one, destroy a\nrandom enemy minion.
cards.flavor: This is fine.

cards.name: Plague of Madness
cards.text: Each player equips\na 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
cards.flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

cards.name: Raid the Sky Temple
cards.text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.\nReward: Ascendant Scroll.
cards.flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

cards.name: Sinister Deal
cards.text: Discover a Lackey.
cards.flavor: "So, what's in the sack?" \n"Something... sinister." \n"Okay, it's a deal."

cards.name: Supreme Archaeology
cards.text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.\nReward: Tome of Origination.
cards.flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

cards.name: Unseal the Vault
cards.text: Quest: Summon 20_minions.\nReward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
cards.flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

cards.name: Untapped Potential
cards.text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns\nwith any unspent Mana.\nReward: Ossirian Tear.
cards.flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

cards.name: Worthy Expedition
cards.text: Discover a Choose One card.
cards.flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

cards.name: Ancient Mysteries
cards.text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
cards.flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

cards.name: Arcane Flakmage
cards.text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

cards.name: Bug Collector
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
cards.flavor: The only one who likes BEEEES!!!

cards.name: Clever Disguise
cards.text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

cards.name: Crystal Merchant
cards.text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

cards.name: Dwarven Archaeologist
cards.text: After you Discover a card, reduce its cost by (1).
cards.flavor: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

cards.name: EVIL Totem
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a Lackey to your hand.
cards.flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

cards.name: Expired Merchant
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

cards.name: Fishflinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a\nrandom Murloc to each player's_hand.
cards.flavor: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

cards.name: Frightened Flunky
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
cards.flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

cards.name: Grandmummy
cards.text: [x]Reborn\n Deathrattle: Give a random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

cards.name: Holy Ripple
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

cards.name: Injured Tol'vir
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
cards.flavor: Me-OW!

cards.name: Kobold Sandtrooper
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy_hero.
cards.flavor: Stay while, take candle.

cards.name: Micro Mummy
cards.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

cards.name: Neferset Ritualist
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full_Health.
cards.flavor: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

cards.name: Penance
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to a_minion.
cards.flavor: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

cards.name: Pressure Plate
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy_minion.
cards.flavor: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

cards.name: Questing Explorer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

cards.name: Quicksand Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this_turn.
cards.flavor: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

cards.name: Sandstorm Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

cards.name: Sandwasp Queen
cards.text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
cards.flavor: Oooh, see that wasp! \nWatch that sting! \nDig in the Sandwasp Queen!

cards.name: Serpent Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
cards.flavor: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

cards.name: Sir Finley of the Sands
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, Discover an\nupgraded Hero Power.
cards.flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

cards.name: Spitting Camel
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\n__deal 1 damage to another__\nrandom friendly minion.
cards.flavor: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

cards.name: Subdue
cards.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
cards.flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

cards.name: Temple Berserker
cards.text: Reborn\nHas +2 Attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

cards.name: Vilefiend
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

cards.name: Whirlkick Master
cards.text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
cards.flavor: C-c-combo!

cards.name: Zephrys the Great
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
cards.flavor: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

cards.name: BEEEES!!!
cards.text: [x]Choose a minion.\nSummon four 1/1 Bees\nthat attack it.
cards.flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

cards.name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a\ndamaged friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

cards.name: Candletaker
cards.text: Reborn
cards.flavor: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

cards.name: Desert Hare
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Desert Hares.
cards.flavor: After they're caught, they’re dessert hares.

cards.name: Desert Spear
cards.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
cards.flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

cards.name: Dune Sculptor
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nadd a random Mage\nminion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

cards.name: EVIL Recruiter
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
cards.flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

cards.name: Flame Ward
cards.text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

cards.name: Generous Mummy
cards.text: Reborn\nYour opponent's cards cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

cards.name: Golden Scarab
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a\n4-Cost card.
cards.flavor: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

cards.name: History Buff
cards.text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Actually... what happened was...

cards.name: Hooked Scimitar
cards.text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

cards.name: Hunter's Pack
cards.text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your_hand.
cards.flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

cards.name: Infested Goblin
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
cards.flavor: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

cards.name: Livewire Lance
cards.text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
cards.flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

cards.name: Mischief Maker
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your_opponent's.
cards.flavor: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

cards.name: Neferset Thrasher
cards.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your_hero.
cards.flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

cards.name: Plague of Murlocs
cards.text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
cards.flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

cards.name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
cards.flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

cards.name: Salhet's Pride
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw two\n1-Health minions from your_deck.
cards.flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

cards.name: Vulpera Scoundrel
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
cards.flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

cards.name: Weaponized Wasp
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
cards.flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

cards.name: Wretched Reclaimer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
cards.flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

cards.name: Ancestral Guardian
cards.text: Lifesteal\nReborn
cards.flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

cards.name: Body Wrapper
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
cards.flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

cards.name: Bone Wraith
cards.text: Taunt\nReborn
cards.flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

cards.name: Conjured Mirage
cards.text: Taunt\nAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
cards.flavor: What you see is Isiset.

cards.name: Diseased Vulture
cards.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

cards.name: Garden Gnome
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na spell that costs (5) or more,\nsummon two 2/2 Treants.
cards.flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

cards.name: High Priest Amet
cards.text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
cards.flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

cards.name: Hyena Alpha
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
cards.flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

cards.name: Impbalming
cards.text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
cards.flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

cards.name: Psychopomp
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
cards.flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

cards.name: Restless Mummy
cards.text: Rush\nReborn
cards.flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

cards.name: Sahket Sapper
cards.text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
cards.flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

cards.name: Shadow of Death
cards.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
cards.flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

cards.name: Splitting Axe
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
cards.flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

cards.name: Sunstruck Henchman
cards.text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
cards.flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

cards.name: Vessina
cards.text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

cards.name: Anka, the Buried
cards.text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
cards.flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

cards.name: Anubisath Defender
cards.text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
cards.flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

cards.name: Bazaar Mugger
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
cards.flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

cards.name: Cloud Prince
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
cards.flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

cards.name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
cards.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
cards.flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

cards.name: Desert Obelisk
cards.text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
cards.flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

cards.name: Elise the Enlightened
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
cards.flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

cards.name: Faceless Lurker
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
cards.flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

cards.name: Mortuary Machine
cards.text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
cards.flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

cards.name: Naga Sand Witch
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
cards.flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

cards.name: Oasis Surger
cards.text: Rush\nChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
cards.flavor: Surge's up, dude!

cards.name: Phalanx Commander
cards.text: Your Taunt minions\nhave +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

cards.name: Plague of Wrath
cards.text: Destroy all damaged minions.
cards.flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

cards.name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
cards.flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

cards.name: Wasteland Assassin
cards.text: Stealth\nReborn
cards.flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

cards.name: Armagedillo
cards.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

cards.name: Armored Goon
cards.text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

cards.name: Blatant Decoy
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player\nsummons the lowest Cost\nminion from their hand.
cards.flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

cards.name: Hidden Oasis
cards.text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
cards.flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

cards.name: Khartut Defender
cards.text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Restore #3\nHealth to your hero.
cards.flavor: Gesundheit!

cards.name: Pharaoh's Blessing
cards.text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

cards.name: Reno the Relicologist
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

cards.name: Riftcleaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
cards.flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

cards.name: Scarlet Webweaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
cards.flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

cards.name: Swarm of Locusts
cards.text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
cards.flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

cards.name: Wild Bloodstinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
cards.flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

cards.name: Dinotamer Brann
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
cards.flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

cards.name: Overflow
cards.text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
cards.flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

cards.name: Siamat
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,\nTaunt, Divine Shield, or\nWindfury (your choice).
cards.flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

cards.name: Wasteland Scorpid
cards.text: Poisonous
cards.flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

cards.name: Wrapped Golem
cards.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
cards.flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

cards.name: Octosari
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
cards.flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

cards.name: Pit Crocolisk
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
cards.flavor: PIT! Not PET!

cards.name: Tip the Scales
cards.text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
cards.flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

cards.name: Tomb Warden
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
cards.flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

cards.name: Tortollan Pilgrim
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a copy of\na spell in your deck and cast\nit with random targets.
cards.flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

cards.name: Anubisath Warbringer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

cards.name: Mogu Fleshshaper
cards.text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

cards.name: Plague of Death
cards.text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
cards.flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

cards.name: Colossus of the Moon
cards.text: Divine Shield\nReborn
cards.flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

cards.name: King Phaoris
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
cards.flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

cards.name: Living Monument
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

cards.name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
cards.text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

cards.name: Embiggen
cards.text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
cards.flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

cards.name: Whispers of EVIL
cards.text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
cards.flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

cards.name: Arcane Breath
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

cards.name: Blazing Battlemage
cards.flavor: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

cards.name: Bloodsail Flybooter
cards.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
cards.flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

cards.name: Clear the Way
cards.text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
cards.flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

cards.name: Depth Charge
cards.text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL_minions.
cards.flavor: * Does not have Charge.

cards.name: Disciple of Galakrond
cards.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

cards.name: Dragon's Hoard
cards.text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
cards.flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

cards.name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
cards.text: Your Hero Power can target_minions.
cards.flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

cards.name: Elemental Allies
cards.text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
cards.flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

cards.name: Hot Air Balloon
cards.text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
cards.flavor: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

cards.name: Learn Draconic
cards.text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
cards.flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

cards.name: Praise Galakrond!
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

cards.name: Rain of Fire
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
cards.flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

cards.name: Righteous Cause
cards.text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.\nReward: Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

cards.name: Sand Breath
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.
cards.flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

cards.name: Secure the Deck
cards.text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

cards.name: Sky Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
cards.flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

cards.name: Storm's Wrath
cards.text: Give your minions +1/+1.\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

cards.name: Strength in Numbers
cards.text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions.\nReward: Summon a minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

cards.name: Surging Tempest
cards.text: Has +1 Attack while you_have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

cards.name: Toxic Reinforcements
cards.text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 1/1 Leper Gnomes.
cards.flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

cards.name: Treenforcements
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
cards.flavor: Treemendous value!

cards.name: Violet Spellwing
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to_your hand.
cards.flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

cards.name: Breath of Dreams
cards.text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

cards.name: Corrosive Breath
cards.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: It's a breath of fresh terror!

cards.name: Dragon Breeder
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

cards.name: Envoy of Lazul
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
cards.flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

cards.name: Evasive Chimaera
cards.text: Poisonous\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

cards.name: Grizzled Wizard
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
cards.flavor: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

cards.name: Invocation of Frost
cards.text: Freeze an enemy. \nInvoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

cards.name: Nether Breath
cards.text: Deal $2 damage.\nIf you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
cards.flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

cards.name: Parachute Brigand
cards.text: [x]After you play a Pirate,\nsummon this minion\nfrom your hand.
cards.flavor: She flies standby.

cards.name: Phase Stalker
cards.text: [x]After you use your Hero\nPower, cast a Secret\nfrom your deck.
cards.flavor: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

cards.name: Ritual Chopper
cards.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

cards.name: Sanctuary
cards.text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

cards.name: Shrubadier
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Treant.
cards.flavor: Her shoots can kill.

cards.name: Tasty Flyfish
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

cards.name: Transmogrifier
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
cards.flavor: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

cards.name: Wyrmrest Purifier
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
cards.flavor: She keeps your deck classy.

cards.name: Ancharrr
cards.text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
cards.flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Awaken!
cards.text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
cards.flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

cards.name: Blowtorch Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
cards.flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

cards.name: Breath of the Infinite
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
cards.flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

cards.name: Bronze Explorer
cards.text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

cards.name: Chenvaala
cards.text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5_Elemental.
cards.flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

cards.name: Dark Skies
cards.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a\nrandom minion. Repeat\nfor each card in your hand.
cards.flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

cards.name: Diving Gryphon
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Draw a Rush minion_from_your_deck.
cards.flavor: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

cards.name: Dragonblight Cultist
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.\nGain +1 Attack for each\nother friendly minion.
cards.flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

cards.name: Dragonrider Talritha
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

cards.name: Dread Raven
cards.text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you_control.
cards.flavor: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

cards.name: EVIL Quartermaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

cards.name: Fire Hawk
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

cards.name: Goboglide Tech
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Mech, gain +1/+1 and_Rush.
cards.flavor: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

cards.name: Lightning Breath
cards.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
cards.flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

cards.name: Living Dragonbreath
cards.text: Your minions can't be_Frozen.
cards.flavor: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

cards.name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose an\nenemy minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
cards.flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

cards.name: Primordial Explorer
cards.text: Poisonous\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
cards.flavor: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

cards.name: Ramming Speed
cards.text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
cards.flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

cards.name: Scalerider
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
cards.flavor: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

cards.name: Seal Fate
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

cards.name: Sky Claw
cards.text: Your other Mechs\nhave +1 Attack.\nBattlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
cards.flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

cards.name: Skybarge
cards.text: [x]After you summon a\nPirate, deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy.
cards.flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

cards.name: Stormhammer
cards.text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
cards.flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

cards.name: Azure Explorer
cards.text: Spell Damage +2\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

cards.name: Bad Luck Albatross
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

cards.name: Devoted Maniac
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

cards.name: Dragonbane
cards.text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

cards.name: Dragonmaw Poacher
cards.text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
cards.flavor: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

cards.name: Evasive Feywing
cards.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

cards.name: Fate Weaver
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, reduce the Cost of\ncards in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

cards.name: Fiendish Rites
cards.text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.
cards.flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

cards.name: Frizz Kindleroost
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by_(2).
cards.flavor: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

cards.name: Grave Rune
cards.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
cards.flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

cards.name: Hippogryph
cards.text: Rush\nTaunt
cards.flavor: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

cards.name: Hoard Pillager
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
cards.flavor: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

cards.name: Lightforged Zealot
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a __4/2_Truesilver_Champion._
cards.flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

cards.name: Molten Breath
cards.text: [x]Deal $5 damage to a\nminion. If you're holding\na Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

cards.name: Nozdormu the Timeless
cards.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Time is mana!

cards.name: Scion of Ruin
cards.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2_copies of this.
cards.flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

cards.name: Squallhunter
cards.text: Spell Damage +2\nOverload: (2)
cards.flavor: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!\n \nAnd since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

cards.name: Troll Batrider
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

cards.name: Umbral Skulker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, add 3 Coins to\nyour hand.
cards.flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

cards.name: Veiled Worshipper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, draw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

cards.name: Wing Commander
cards.text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
cards.flavor: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

cards.name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
cards.flavor: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

cards.name: Aeroponics
cards.text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (2) less for each Treant you control.
cards.flavor: Good seeds can go far.

cards.name: Amber Watcher
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #8_Health.
cards.flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

cards.name: Bandersmosh
cards.text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
cards.flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

cards.name: Big Ol' Whelp
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

cards.name: Chromatic Egg
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly Discover\na Dragon to hatch into.\nDeathrattle: Hatch!
cards.flavor: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

cards.name: Chronobreaker
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

cards.name: Cobalt Spellkin
cards.text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

cards.name: Crazed Netherwing
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
cards.flavor: Always tail swipes left.

cards.name: Cumulo-Maximus
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
cards.flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

cards.name: Dragon's Pack
cards.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

cards.name: Faceless Corruptor
cards.text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform\none of your minions into\na copy of this.
cards.flavor: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

cards.name: Kobold Stickyfinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
cards.flavor: He no take candle. He take sword.

cards.name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover an\n upgraded Mage spell.
cards.flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

cards.name: Necrium Apothecary
cards.text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

cards.name: Platebreaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
cards.flavor: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

cards.name: Rolling Fireball
cards.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to\nthe left or right.
cards.flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

cards.name: Shield of Galakrond
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

cards.name: Skyfin
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
cards.flavor: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" \n\n"Yes."

cards.name: Stowaway
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards\nin your deck that didn't start\nthere, draw 2 of them.
cards.flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

cards.name: Tentacled Menace
cards.text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their_Costs.
cards.flavor: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

cards.name: Time Rip
cards.text: Destroy a minion.\nInvoke Galakrond.
cards.flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

cards.name: Waxadred
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
cards.flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

cards.name: Abyssal Summoner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nDemon with Taunt and stats\nequal to your hand size.
cards.flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

cards.name: Camouflaged Dirigible
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your_next turn.
cards.flavor: "What does that cloud look like to you?" \n\n"Trouble."

cards.name: Candle Breath
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
cards.flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

cards.name: Corrupt Elementalist
cards.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
cards.flavor: Her element is "Horns."

cards.name: Emerald Explorer
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Make it a double dragon!

cards.name: Evasive Wyrm
cards.text: Divine Shield, Rush\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

cards.name: Flik Skyshiv
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a\nminion and all copies of it\n(wherever they are).
cards.flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

cards.name: Gyrocopter
cards.text: Rush\nWindfury
cards.flavor: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

cards.name: Kronx Dragonhoof
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw Galakrond.\nIf you're already Galakrond,\nunleash a Devastation.
cards.flavor: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

cards.name: Nithogg
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
cards.flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

cards.name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
cards.text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
cards.flavor: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

cards.name: Veranus
cards.text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
cards.flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

cards.name: Dragoncaster
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
cards.flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

cards.name: Evasive Drakonid
cards.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

cards.name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card.\nIt costs (1).\n(@)
cards.flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

cards.name: Galakrond, the Tempest
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n2/2 Storms with Rush.\n(@)
cards.flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

cards.name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion.\nGive it +4/+4.\n(@)
cards.flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

cards.name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1\nrandom enemy minion.\n(@)
cards.flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

cards.name: Galakrond, the Wretched
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon\n1 random Demon.\n(@)
cards.flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

cards.name: Goru the Mightree
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He's untreefeated.

cards.name: Lightforged Crusader
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
cards.flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

cards.name: Shu'ma
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\nfill your board with 1/1_Tentacles.
cards.flavor: How to tell your mother to go away.

cards.name: Valdris Felgorge
cards.text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
cards.flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

cards.name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
cards.text: Battlecry: Attack ALL\nother minions.
cards.flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

cards.name: Mana Giant
cards.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
cards.flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

cards.name: Murozond the Infinite
cards.text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last_turn.
cards.flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

cards.name: Twin Tyrant
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
cards.flavor: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

cards.name: Zzeraku the Warped
cards.text: [x]Whenever your hero\ntakes damage, summon\na 6/6 Nether Drake.
cards.flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

cards.name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (1).
cards.flavor: Givin' lives and takin' names.

cards.name: Sathrovarr
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

cards.name: Ysera, Unleashed
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
cards.flavor: Releash the Dragon!

cards.name: Boom Squad
cards.text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
cards.flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

cards.name: Cleric of Scales
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
cards.flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

cards.name: Fiendish Servant
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion.
cards.flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

cards.name: Risky Skipper
cards.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all_minions.
cards.flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

cards.name: Air Raid
cards.text: Twinspell\nSummon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
cards.flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

cards.name: Explosive Evolution
cards.text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
cards.flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

cards.name: Fresh Scent
cards.text: Twinspell\nGive a Beast +2/+2.
cards.flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

cards.name: Licensed Adventurer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Quest, add a Coin\nto your hand.
cards.flavor: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

cards.name: Rising Winds
cards.text: Twinspell\nChoose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2_Eagle.
cards.flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

cards.name: Shotbot
cards.text: Reborn
cards.flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

cards.name: Skyvateer
cards.text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

cards.name: Steel Beetle
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

cards.name: Twisted Knowledge
cards.text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
cards.flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

cards.name: Waxmancy
cards.text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
cards.flavor: The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. \n\nSome think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

cards.name: Arcane Amplifier
cards.text: Your Hero Power deals 2_extra damage.
cards.flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

cards.name: Bomb Wrangler
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a_1/1 Boom Bot.
cards.flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

cards.name: Chaos Gazer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Corrupt a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
cards.flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

cards.name: Chopshop Copter
cards.text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
cards.flavor: Invention is the mother of entropy.

cards.name: Dark Prophecy
cards.text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
cards.flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

cards.name: Skydiving Instructor
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\n1-Cost minion from\nyour deck.
cards.flavor: "Is it dangerous?"\n \n"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

cards.name: Escaped Manasaber
cards.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

cards.name: Frenzied Felwing
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
cards.flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

cards.name: Grand Lackey Erkh
cards.text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
cards.flavor: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

cards.name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
cards.flavor: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

cards.name: The Fist of Ra-den
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

cards.name: Boompistol Bully
cards.text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry_cards cost (5)_more next turn.
cards.flavor: Preventing insults with injuries.

cards.name: Hailbringer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nIce Shards that Freeze.
cards.flavor: Knows every way to greet someone.

cards.name: Rotnest Drake
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, destroy a random\nenemy minion.
cards.flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

cards.name: Scalelord
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

cards.name: Shadow Sculptor
cards.text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
cards.flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

cards.name: Aeon Reaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to_a minion equal to its_Attack.
cards.flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

cards.name: Animated Avalanche
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\nsummon a copy of this.
cards.flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

cards.name: Winged Guardian
cards.text: Taunt, Reborn\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

cards.name: Eye of the Storm
cards.text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
cards.flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

cards.name: The Amazing Reno
cards.text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
cards.flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."

cards.name: Aldor Attendant
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost_of your Librams by_(1) this game.
cards.flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

cards.name: Blackjack Stunner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (1) more.
cards.flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

cards.name: Crimson Sigil Runner
cards.text: Outcast: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

cards.name: Ethereal Augmerchant
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

cards.name: Evocation
cards.text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
cards.flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

cards.name: Font of Power
cards.text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
cards.flavor: It's Comic Sans.

cards.name: Guardian Augmerchant
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

cards.name: Helboar
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

cards.name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\nequip a 3/2 Axe.
cards.flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

cards.name: Imprisoned Homunculus
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nTaunt
cards.flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

cards.name: Imprisoned Sungill
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens, summon two 1/1\nMurlocs.
cards.flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

cards.name: Infectious Sporeling
cards.text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious_Sporeling.
cards.flavor: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

cards.name: Reliquary of Souls
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

cards.name: Renew
cards.text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

cards.name: Rocket Augmerchant
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
cards.flavor: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

cards.name: Shadow Council
cards.text: Replace your hand\nwith random Demons.\nGive them +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

cards.name: Soulbound Ashtongue
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
cards.flavor: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

cards.name: Spymistress
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

cards.name: Sword and Board
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
cards.flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

cards.name: Unstable Felbolt
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
cards.flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

cards.name: Ambush
cards.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
cards.flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

cards.name: Apexis Smuggler
cards.text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

cards.name: Ashtongue Slayer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

cards.name: Astromancer Solarian
cards.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

cards.name: Bamboozle
cards.text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
cards.flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

cards.name: Bonechewer Brawler
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this minion takes\n_damage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

cards.name: Corsair Cache
cards.text: Draw a weapon.\nGive it +1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

cards.name: Dirty Tricks
cards.text: [x]Secret: After your\nopponent casts a spell,\ndraw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

cards.name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

cards.name: Furious Felfin
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero\nattacked this turn, gain\n+1 Attack and Rush.
cards.flavor: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

cards.name: Hand of A'dal
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

cards.name: Immolation Aura
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
cards.flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

cards.name: Imprisoned Felmaw
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\n__attack a random enemy.
cards.flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

cards.name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\ngive all minions in your hand +2/+1.
cards.flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

cards.name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nRush
cards.flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

cards.name: Incanter's Flow
cards.text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).
cards.flavor: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

cards.name: Ironbark
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

cards.name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
cards.text: [x]Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

cards.name: Libram of Wisdom
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
cards.flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

cards.name: Mo'arg Artificer
cards.text: All minions take double damage from spells.
cards.flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

cards.name: Murgur Murgurgle
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

cards.name: Netherwalker
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
cards.flavor: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

cards.name: Pack Tactics
cards.text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
cards.flavor: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

cards.name: Rustsworn Initiate
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with\nSpell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

cards.name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
cards.text: Draw a Beast.\nGive it +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

cards.name: Sethekk Veilweaver
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell on\na minion, add a Priest\nspell to your hand.
cards.flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

cards.name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
cards.text: [x]After you play a Secret,\nDiscover a Secret from\na different class.
cards.flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

cards.name: Spectral Sight
cards.text: [x]Draw a card.\nOutcast: Draw another.
cards.flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

cards.name: Starscryer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
cards.flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

cards.name: Akama
cards.text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama\nPrime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

cards.name: Apotheosis
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

cards.name: Archspore Msshi'fn
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

cards.name: Augmented Porcupine
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

cards.name: Bladestorm
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
cards.flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

cards.name: Blistering Rot
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a Rot with stats\nequal to this minion's.
cards.flavor: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

cards.name: Bogbeam
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to_a minion.\nCosts (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

cards.name: Bogstrok Clacker
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
cards.flavor: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

cards.name: Bonechewer Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
cards.flavor: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

cards.name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
cards.text: [x]Whenever your hero would\ntake damage, this loses\n_1 Durability instead.
cards.flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

cards.name: Darkglare
cards.text: After your hero takes damage, refresh 2 Mana_Crystals.
cards.flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

cards.name: Dragonmaw Overseer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

cards.name: Frozen Shadoweaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
cards.flavor: She still wears her Frozen Shadoweave set despite the many, many nerfs. She just can't let it go!

cards.name: Fungal Fortunes
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
cards.flavor: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

cards.name: Greyheart Sage
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Stealthed minion,\ndraw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

cards.name: Imprisoned Observer
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

cards.name: Imprisoned Satyr
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
cards.flavor: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

cards.name: Lady Vashj
cards.text: [x]Spell Damage +1\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj\nPrime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

cards.name: Marshspawn
cards.text: Battlecry: If you cast\na spell last turn,\nDiscover a spell.
cards.flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

cards.name: Netherwind Portal
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random\n4-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

cards.name: Overconfident Orc
cards.text: Taunt\nWhile at full Health,\nthis has +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: "I am da powerful! You are da poop!"

cards.name: Serpentshrine Portal
cards.text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

cards.name: Teron Gorefiend
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

cards.name: Terrorguard Escapee
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your_opponent.
cards.flavor: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

cards.name: Totemic Reflection
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

cards.name: Underlight Angling Rod
cards.text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

cards.name: Warmaul Challenger
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose\nan enemy minion.\nBattle it to the death!
cards.flavor: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

cards.name: Zixor, Apex Predator
cards.text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor\nPrime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

cards.name: Ashtongue Battlelord
cards.text: Taunt\nLifesteal
cards.flavor: Demons have destroyed the lives of the Ashtongue draenei. Now he’s got a shoulder-axe to grind.

cards.name: Burrowing Scorpid
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nIf that kills the target,\ngain Stealth.
cards.flavor: It's a game of hide and go sting.

cards.name: Disguised Wanderer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
cards.flavor: He wanders east... always into the east.

cards.name: Felfin Navigator
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

cards.name: Germination
cards.text: Summon a copy of a friendly minion.\nGive the copy Taunt.
cards.flavor: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

cards.name: Kargath Bladefist
cards.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
cards.flavor: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

cards.name: Kayn Sunfury
cards.text: Charge\nAll friendly attacks ignore_Taunt.
cards.flavor: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

cards.name: Magtheridon
cards.text: [x]Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
cards.flavor: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

cards.name: Maiev Shadowsong
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion.\nIt goes Dormant for 2 turns.
cards.flavor: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

cards.name: Mok'Nathal Lion
cards.text: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

cards.name: Nightshade Matron
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
cards.flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

cards.name: Overgrowth
cards.text: Gain two empty Mana_Crystals.
cards.flavor: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

cards.name: Replicat-o-tron
cards.text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
cards.flavor: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

cards.name: Rustsworn Cultist
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give your\nother minions "Deathrattle:\nSummon a 1/1 Demon."
cards.flavor: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

cards.name: Scrap Shot
cards.text: Deal $3 damage.\nGive a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

cards.name: The Dark Portal
cards.text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
cards.flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

cards.name: Torrent
cards.text: [x]Deal $8 damage to a\nminion. Costs (3) less if\nyou cast a spell last turn.
cards.flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

cards.name: Vivid Spores
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
cards.flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

cards.name: Al'ar
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a\n 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
cards.flavor: Week #679: Still no mount...

cards.name: Aldor Truthseeker
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
cards.flavor: It’s under 'T.'

cards.name: Apexis Blast
cards.text: Deal $5 damage.\nIf your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

cards.name: Boggspine Knuckles
cards.text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
cards.flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

cards.name: Glowfly Swarm
cards.text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your_hand.
cards.flavor: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

cards.name: Libram of Justice
cards.text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
cards.flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

cards.name: Metamorphosis
cards.text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 4 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
cards.flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

cards.name: Psyche Split
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

cards.name: Ruststeed Raider
cards.text: Taunt, Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

cards.name: Scrap Golem
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

cards.name: Shattered Rumbler
cards.text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

cards.name: Waste Warden
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to\na minion and all others of\nthe same minion type.
cards.flavor: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

cards.name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
cards.flavor: "I will find you, sky!"

cards.name: Fel Summoner
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your_hand.
cards.flavor: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

cards.name: Hand of Gul'dan
cards.text: When you play\nor discard this,\ndraw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

cards.name: Imprisoned Antaen
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

cards.name: Keli'dan the Breaker
