cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
cards.flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

cards.name: Scavenging Shivarra
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all_other minions.
cards.flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

cards.name: Skull of Gul'dan
cards.text: Draw 3 cards.\nOutcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
cards.flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

cards.name: The Lurker Below
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
cards.flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

cards.name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
cards.text: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
cards.flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

cards.name: Bloodboil Brute
cards.text: Rush\nCosts (1) less for each damaged minion.
cards.flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

cards.name: Bonechewer Vanguard
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

cards.name: Cursed Vagrant
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
cards.flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

cards.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
cards.text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
cards.flavor: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”
cards.howToGetGold: Earnable through Trial by Felfire Challenges.

cards.name: Lady Liadrin
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
cards.flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

cards.name: Marsh Hydra
cards.text: [x]Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

cards.name: Priestess of Fury
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

cards.name: Skeletal Dragon
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, add\na Dragon to your hand.
cards.flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

cards.name: Soul Mirror
cards.text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
cards.flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

cards.name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
cards.flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

cards.name: Coilfang Warlord
cards.text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a\n 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

cards.name: Deep Freeze
cards.text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
cards.flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

cards.name: Enhanced Dreadlord
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 5/5\nDreadlord with Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

cards.name: Supreme Abyssal
cards.text: Can't attack heroes.
cards.flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

cards.name: Libram of Hope
cards.text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

cards.name: Pit Commander
cards.text: Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
cards.flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

cards.name: Ysiel Windsinger
cards.text: Your spells cost (1).
cards.flavor: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. \n*But not less than (1)

cards.name: Nagrand Slam
cards.text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
cards.flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

cards.name: Scrapyard Colossus
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Heap on heapin' on.

cards.name: Blur
cards.text: Your hero can't take damage this turn.
cards.flavor: "What are you trying to tell me? That I can dodge axes?" \n"I’m trying to tell you that when you’re a Demon Hunter, you won’t have to."

cards.name: Battlefiend
cards.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

cards.name: Consume Magic
cards.text: Silence an enemy_minion.\nOutcast: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Please be mindful when consuming raw or undercooked magic.

cards.name: Mana Burn
cards.text: Your opponent has 2 fewer Mana Crystals next turn.
cards.flavor: One way to ensure that they are not prepared.

cards.name: Twin Slice
cards.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
cards.flavor: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

cards.name: Ur'zul Horror
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
cards.flavor: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

cards.name: Blade Dance
cards.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to 3 random enemy minions.
cards.flavor: The surest way to clear the dance floor.

cards.name: Feast of Souls
cards.text: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn.
cards.flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!

cards.name: Umberwing
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Felwings.
cards.flavor: Demon Hunters refer to these glaives as "the ol’ flappy-attackys."

cards.name: Eye Beam
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion.\nOutcast: This costs (1).
cards.flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

cards.name: Wrathscale Naga
cards.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a_random enemy.
cards.flavor: If throwing glaives is what you crave; \nsummon tokens and make 'em broken.

cards.name: Altruis the Outcast
cards.text:
[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
cards.flavor: Altruis betrayed Illidan to forge his own way in Outland. With Blackjack. And Netherdrakes.

cards.name: Illidari Felblade
cards.text: Rush\nOutcast: Gain Immune this_turn.
cards.flavor: A whirling dervish of demonic devastation.

cards.name: Raging Felscreamer
cards.text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

cards.name: Soul Split
cards.text: Choose a friendly Demon. Summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Spoiler: they're both the evil twin.

cards.name: Command the Illidari
cards.text: Summon six 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
cards.flavor:
Give me an R! 
Give me a U! 
Give me an S! 
Give me an H! 
You two, you’re exclamation points!

cards.name: Wrathspike Brute
cards.text: [x]Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
cards.flavor: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

cards.name: Flamereaper
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.
cards.flavor: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

cards.name: Hulking Overfiend
cards.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
cards.flavor: To hulk, perhaps, to fiend: ay, there's the rub.

cards.name: Nethrandamus
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random @-Cost minions. (Upgrades each time a friendly minion dies!)
cards.flavor: Missed the big descent with the other dragons. But better late and nether!

cards.name: Desk Imp
cards.flavor: "I feel inky!"

cards.name: First Day of School
cards.text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

cards.name: Lightning Bloom
cards.text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.\nOverload: (2)
cards.flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
cards.flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

cards.name: Adorable Infestation
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
cards.flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

cards.name: Animated Broomstick
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
cards.flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

cards.name: Athletic Studies
cards.text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: It's a quick read.

cards.name: Brain Freeze
cards.text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
cards.flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

cards.name: Carrion Studies
cards.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

cards.name: Demon Companion
cards.text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
cards.flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

cards.name: Demonic Studies
cards.text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

cards.name: Devolving Missiles
cards.text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

cards.name: Double Jump
cards.text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
cards.flavor: The key to every speed run.

cards.name: Draconic Studies
cards.text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your\nnext one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

cards.name: Felosophy
cards.text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost\nDemon in your hand.\nOutcast: Give both +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

cards.name: Frazzled Freshman
cards.flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

cards.name: Gibberling
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
cards.flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

cards.name: Intrepid Initiate
cards.text: Spellburst: Gain +2_Attack.
cards.flavor: How you like them apples?

cards.name: Lab Partner
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

cards.name: Nature Studies
cards.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

cards.name: Overwhelm
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
cards.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

cards.name: Partner Assignment
cards.text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to_your hand.
cards.flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

cards.name: Pen Flinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Spellburst: Return this to_your hand.
cards.flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

cards.name: Primordial Studies
cards.text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

cards.name: Secret Passage
cards.text: Replace your hand with 5 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
cards.flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

cards.name: Shield of Honor
cards.text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

cards.name: Sphere of Sapience
cards.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

cards.name: Spirit Jailer
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

cards.name: Tour Guide
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
cards.flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

cards.name: Trueaim Crescent
cards.text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
cards.flavor: You could have just pointed.

cards.name: Wand Thief
cards.text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
cards.flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

cards.name: Wave of Apathy
cards.text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
cards.flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

cards.name: Wolpertinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

cards.name: Argent Braggart
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

cards.name: Boneweb Egg
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

cards.name: Cram Session
cards.text: Draw $1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
cards.flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

cards.name: Cult Neophyte
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
cards.flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

cards.name: Diligent Notetaker
cards.text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

cards.name: In Formation!
cards.text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

cards.name: Manafeeder Panthara
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

cards.name: Plagiarize
cards.text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
cards.flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

cards.name: Power Word: Feast
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
cards.flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

cards.name: Rune Dagger
cards.text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
cards.flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

cards.name: Sneaky Delinquent
cards.text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
cards.flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

cards.name: Soul Shear
cards.text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nminion. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

cards.name: Transfer Student
cards.text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
cards.flavor:
Oh, the places you'll go!
There is so much to fight!
There are boards to be explored.
There are dreams to take flight.

cards.name: Trick Totem
cards.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
cards.flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

cards.name: Voracious Reader
cards.text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
cards.flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

cards.name: Wandmaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

cards.name: Ace Hunter Kreen
cards.text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
cards.flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

cards.name: Bloated Python
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
cards.flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

cards.name: Ceremonial Maul
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
cards.flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

cards.name: Coerce
cards.text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
cards.flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

cards.name: Combustion
cards.text: [x]Deal $4 damage to\na minion. Any excess\ndamages both neighbors.
cards.flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

cards.name: Educated Elekk
cards.text: [x]Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
cards.flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

cards.name: Enchanted Cauldron
cards.text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
cards.flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

cards.name: Firebrand
cards.text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all_enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

cards.name: Gift of Luminance
cards.text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
cards.flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

cards.name: Goody Two-Shields
cards.text: Divine Shield\nSpellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

cards.name: Instructor Fireheart
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
cards.flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

cards.name: Lord Barov
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

cards.name: Magehunter
cards.text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
cards.flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

cards.name: Mindrender Illucia
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap hands and decks with your opponent until your next turn.
cards.flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

cards.name: Molten Blast
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
cards.flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

cards.name: Playmaker
cards.text: [x]After you play a Rush\nminion, summon a copy\n_with 1 Health remaining.
cards.flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

cards.name: Professor Slate
cards.text: Your spells are Poisonous.
cards.flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

cards.name: Robes of Protection
cards.text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
cards.flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

cards.name: School Spirits
cards.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

cards.name: Self-Sharpening Sword
cards.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

cards.name: Shadowlight Scholar
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
cards.flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

cards.name: Shan'do Wildclaw
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
cards.flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

cards.name: Shardshatter Mystic
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

cards.name: Speaker Gidra
cards.text: [x]Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
cards.flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

cards.name: Vulpera Toxinblade
cards.text: Your weapon has +2_Attack.
cards.flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

cards.name: Brittlebone Destroyer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's\nHealth changed this turn,\ndestroy a minion.
cards.flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

cards.name: Cabal Acolyte
cards.text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

cards.name: Crimson Hothead
cards.text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

cards.name: Disciplinarian Gandling
cards.text: [x]After you play a minion,\ndestroy it and summon a\n4/4 Failed Student.
cards.flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

cards.name: Divine Rager
cards.text: Divine Shield
cards.flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

cards.name: Fishy Flyer
cards.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a_4/3 Ghost with Rush to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Like a fish out of water.

cards.name: Glide
cards.text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
cards.flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

cards.name: Groundskeeper
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
cards.flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

cards.name: High Abbess Alura
cards.text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
cards.flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

cards.name: Infiltrator Lilian
cards.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
cards.flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

cards.name: Krolusk Barkstripper
cards.text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

cards.name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Reorder your deck\nfrom the highest Cost card\nto the lowest Cost card.
cards.flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

cards.name: Marrowslicer
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

cards.name: Potion of Illusion
cards.text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
cards.flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

cards.name: Reaper's Scythe
cards.text: [x]Spellburst: Also\ndamages adjacent\nminions this turn.
cards.flavor: Die. Die. Die.

cards.name: Shifty Sophomore
cards.text: Stealth\nSpellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
cards.flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

cards.name: Star Student Stelina
cards.text: [x]Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
cards.flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

cards.name: Steeldancer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal to\nyour weapon's Attack.
cards.flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

cards.name: Vilefiend Trainer
cards.text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1_Demons.
cards.flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

cards.name: Wretched Tutor
cards.text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

cards.name: Blessing of Authority
cards.text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
cards.flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

cards.name: Blood Herald
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

cards.name: Cutting Class
cards.text: [x]Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less per Attack\nof your weapon.
cards.flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

cards.name: Doctor Krastinov
cards.text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

cards.name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
cards.text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
cards.flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry a little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

cards.name: Jandice Barov
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies _when it takes damage.
cards.flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

cards.name: Lake Thresher
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
cards.flavor: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" \n"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

cards.name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
cards.text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

cards.name: Ogremancer
cards.text: [x]Whenever your opponent\ncasts a spell, summon a 2/2\nSkeleton with Taunt.
cards.flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

cards.name: Ras Frostwhisper
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
cards.flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

cards.name: Soulshard Lapidary
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

cards.name: Steward of Scrolls
cards.text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

cards.name: Teacher's Pet
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a\nrandom 3-Cost Beast.
cards.flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

cards.name: Totem Goliath
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems.\nOverload: (2)
cards.flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

cards.name: Twilight Runner
cards.text: Stealth\nWhenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

cards.name: Vectus
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
cards.flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

cards.name: Void Drinker
cards.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy\na Soul Fragment in your\ndeck to gain +3/+3.
cards.flavor: It has no taste.

cards.name: Wyrm Weaver
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/3 Mana Wyrms.
cards.flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

cards.name: Devout Pupil
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
cards.flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

cards.name: Forest Warden Omu
cards.text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

cards.name: Initiation
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
cards.flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

cards.name: Judicious Junior
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

cards.name: Onyx Magescribe
cards.text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

cards.name: Runic Carvings
cards.text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
cards.flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

cards.name: Smug Senior
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a_5/7 Ghost with Taunt to_your hand.
cards.flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

cards.name: Sorcerous Substitute
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
cards.flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

cards.name: Commencement
cards.text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

cards.name: Cycle of Hatred
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
cards.flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

cards.name: Fel Guardians
cards.text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a_friendly minion dies.
cards.flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

cards.name: Guardian Animals
cards.text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
cards.flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

cards.name: Keymaster Alabaster
cards.text: [x]Whenever your opponent\n_draws a card, add a copy to_\n_your hand that costs (1).
cards.flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

cards.name: Soulciologist Malicia
cards.text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
cards.flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

cards.name: Flesh Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
cards.flavor: "A BIG mistake."

cards.name: Plagued Protodrake
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

cards.name: Tidal Wave
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to\nall minions.
cards.flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

cards.name: Troublemaker
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
cards.flavor: "Prepare for trouble!"\n"Make it double!"

cards.name: Turalyon, the Tenured
cards.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks\na minion, set the defender's\nAttack and Health to 3.
cards.flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

cards.name: Ancient Void Hound
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsteal 1 Attack and Health\nfrom all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

cards.name: Archwitch Willow
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
cards.flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

cards.name: Rattlegore
cards.text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
cards.flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

cards.name: Survival of the Fittest
cards.text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.
